name: userSSOTokenDelete
description:
Revoke a user's SSO token.

After calling this API, the SSO user will be logged out of their current Zoom session.
**Scopes:** `user:write:admin` `user:write` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

userId.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass `me` as the value for userId.
